Posts.Content: Hi madds14, I hope you are doing well. I found your reply whole googling Mr Vashisht - my mum was dx 8 Feb and is under Mr Vashisht's care at West mid.Â  Her surgery is coming up and she has been told it will be day surgery. I gather this is normal, but sounds a bit scary to the uninitiated - I just wondered if this was your experience? We think very highly of Mr Vashisht so far! E
